review.review: I really like the signature drink Uni milk tea. It tastes so good and I strongly recommenced to try it! The service there is also good! The cashier is so patient to introduce me about their tea categories.
I am so happy that this bubble tea shop is so considerate. The customer service is amazing! I had a great weekend with my friends there!

review.review: This place is really serious of tea making! I could really tase the real tea flavor in the bubble tea drinks! The marble milk tea is my love!
